title: Gorgeous Vintage Building with End Unit Remodel W/D - Minutes to Rail
posting_body: ['End Unit Gorgeous Vintage Building with High End Remodel W/D - Minutes to Rail', 'Property Address', '2350 Beacon AVE S - 01 | Seattle, WA 98144', 'Available: 09/06/2022', 'Offered By', 'Westward Properties, LLC |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'HIGH END Renovated NORTH BEACON HILL 1 Bedroom Unit with:', '-  Washer/Dryer in unit', '- New wood kitchen cabinets and granite', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Garbage disposal and dishwasher', '- Beautiful refinished hardwood flooring', '- Bathroom upgrades', '- High Speed Internet Available', '- BBQ on Site', '- Built in Sitting Area', '- Covered Bike Rack', '- Pets Accepted', '- Park Like Setting with Bike Path adjacent to Building', '- Only 1/4 mile to the North Beacon Hill Light Rail Station', 'Garbage/water/sewer utility $95 one person / $115 two people', 'Off Street Assigned Parking: $75', 'Pet rent: Cats & small animals $35 / Dogs $50 > Pets accepted with approval', 'Application fee: $80', "Deposit $ Equal to First Month's Rent (Fully Refundable)", "Get all the aesthetic benefits of living in a Vintage 1950's building with all the modern comforts!", 'QUIET 1 bedroom unit that with a lot of storage.', 'VIEWS of Elliot Bay and green belt with south facing windows.', "VINTAGE late 50's building with modern finishes and tech upgrades.", 'COMMUNITY areas around building including bike racks, picnic table and BBQ for the summer', 'PARKING:', 'Off Street and assigned space available', 'PRIME North Beacon Hill location:', '6 minute walk to light rail station', 'Close to shopping/restaurants/grocery', '5 minute drive to downtown.', '10 minute walk to STADIUMS and STARBUCKS HQ', 'Technology UPGRADED:', 'High Speed Internet and Digital Cable Upgraded Building service available through Wave Broadband', 'It is our intention to comply with the federal Fair Housing Act and any Seattle ordinances, which prohibit any preference, limitation, or discrimination because of race, color, religion, sex, handicap, familial status, or national origin, voucher status or intention to make such preference, limitation or discrimination.', 'General Criteria Reviewed:', 'Prior evictions or collections from prior landlords;', 'Criminal history per Seattle code;', 'Income to rent ratio of at least 2.5;', 'Good credit history free of negative credit issues which may indicate applicant is high-risk or indicates a pattern of payment delinquency.', 'There may be some flexibility on student loans and medical debts depending on the circumstance.', 'Application/Leasing Process:', 'If you are interested in applying for the unit you have viewed, please request an application.', 'Our system only allows for applications to be filled out online.', 'It is not possible to accept a paper application.', 'Once you receive an email with a link to the application, it is not complete until submitted with the accompanying application fee which is due at time of submission through the same portal.', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'If you need language assistance or a reasonable accommodation, you may request additional time to complete the application.', 'To receive the application, each applicant residing in the unit (18 and older) must provide their full name and email address and complete the application in full to be considered for tenancy.', 'Applications are not accepted if not completed in full and the system itself will not accept the application until the fee has been paid!', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 625', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $1,750.00', 'Available: 09/06/2022', 'Application Fee: $80.00', 'Security Deposit: $1,750.00', 'Pet Policy',
